pageProduct.name: Palmers Coconut Oil Detoxifying Charcoal Facial Sheet Mask 18ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Coconut Oil Charcoal Sheet Mask uses natural charcoal sourced from coconut husks in combination with Willow Bark and Marshmallow Root Extract, to draw out impurities, leaving skin clear, luminous and detoxified.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children.

Common Uses

Sheet mask delivery system allows for optimal penetration of active ingredients. Single use. 100% cotton sheet. Hypoallergenic. Dermatologist Tested.

Ingredients

Water, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Xanthan Gum, Glycerin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (and) Potassium Sorbate (and) Sodium Benzoate (and) Citric Acid, Salicylic Acid, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Polyglyceryl-10 Oleate, Tocopherols (and), Charcoal Powder, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Gardenia Tahitensis Extract, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Fragrance (Parfum), Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Salix Nigra (Willow) Bark Extract, Glycerin (and) Water (and) Althaea Officinalis Root Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Camellia Oleifera Leaf Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate

Directions

Unfold mask and place onto clean, dry skin, smoothing the edges to the contours of the face. Relax for 10 minutes. Remove mask. Massage remaining product into the skin.
